metadata.title: CVE-2019-18890 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A SQL injection vulnerability in Redmine through 3.2.9 and 3.3.x before3.3.10 allows Redmine users to access protected information via a craftedobject query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2
redmine-mysql - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2
redmine-pgsql - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2
redmine-sqlite - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2').
